AboutSection.title: Hello, I'm Oleksandr
AboutSection.description: I am a front-end developer who creates modern and user-friendly websites. My priority is to design intuitive interfaces that provide a great user experience.

Skills.title: Creativity
Skills.description: I'm a Front-end developer with experience in creating websites, Chrome extensions, and web process automation, and I have skills in layout, APIs, and writing scripts to optimise tasks.
